text: The SOCATA MS.880 Rallye is a French light aircraft used by civilian and military users. It's first mission is training. == History == It was create by Morane-Saulnier and after built by SOCATA. A military light attack version is known as Rallye 235 Guerrier. Some were built under licence in Poland as PZL Koliber. Category:Aviation in France Category:Civil aircraft
title: SOCATA MS.880 Rallye
